descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

notice.displayName: This node connects to the Microsoft 365 cloud platform. Use the 'Extract from File' and 'Convert to File' nodes to directly manipulate spreadsheet files (.xls, .csv, etc). More info.
notice.name: notice

resource.name: resource

options.name: Table
options.description: Represents an Excel table

options.name: Workbook
options.description: A workbook is the top level object which contains one or more worksheets

options.name: Sheet
options.description: A sheet is a grid of cells which can contain data, tables, charts, etc

resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Append
options.description: Append data to sheet

options.name: Append or Update
options.description: Append a new row or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

options.name: Clear
options.description: Clear sheet

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete sheet

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get a list of sheets

options.name: Get Rows
options.description: Retrieve a list of sheet rows

options.name: Update
options.description: Update rows of a sheet or sheet range

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

dataMode.name: dataMode

options.name: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns
options.description: Use when node input properties match destination column names

options.name: Map Each Column Below
options.description: Set the value for each destination column

dataMode.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

data.name: data
data.description: Raw values for the specified range as array of string arrays in JSON format. Should match the specified range: one array item for each row.
data.ai_hint: Raw values for the specified range as array of string arrays in JSON format. Should match the specified range: one array item for each row.

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi

values.name: column
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

fieldsUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

options.name: options
appendAfterSelectedRange
options.description: Whether to append data after the selected range or used range

options.name: rawData
options.description: Whether the data should be returned RAW instead of parsed into keys according to their header

options.name: dataProperty
options.description: The name of the property into which to write the RAW data

options.name: updateAll
options.description: Whether to update all matching rows or just the first match

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

selectRange.name: selectRange

options.name: Automatically
options.description: The whole used range on the selected sheet will be converted into a table

options.name: Manually
options.description: Select a range that will be converted into a table

selectRange.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

range.name: range
range.description: The sheet range to read the data from specified using a A1-style notation, has to be specific e.g A1:B5, generic ranges like A:B are not supported. Leave blank to use whole used range in the sheet.
range.hint: First row must contain column names
range.ai_hint: The sheet range to read the data from specified using a A1-style notation, has to be specific e.g A1:B5, generic ranges like A:B are not supported. Leave blank to use whole used range in the sheet.

hasHeaders.name: hasHeaders
hasHeaders.description: Whether the range has column labels. When this property set to false Excel will automatically generate header shifting the data down by one row.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

rawData.name: rawData
rawData.description: Whether the data should be returned RAW instead of parsed into keys according to their header

dataProperty.name: dataProperty
dataProperty.description: The name of the property into which to write the RAW data
dataProperty.ai_hint: The name of the property into which to write the RAW data

filters.name: filters

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of the fields to include in the response

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

lookupColumn.name: lookupColumn
lookupColumn.description: The name of the column in which to look for value
lookupColumn.ai_hint: The name of the column in which to look for value

lookupValue.name: lookupValue
lookupValue.description: The value to look for in column
lookupValue.ai_hint: The value to look for in column

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the sheet to be added. The name should be unique. If not specified, Excel will determine the name of the new worksheet.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

applyTo.name: applyTo

options.name: All
options.description: Clear data in cells and remove all formatting

options.name: Formats
options.description: Clear formatting(e.g. font size, color) of cells

options.name: Contents
options.description: Clear data contained in cells

applyTo.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

keyRow.name: keyRow
keyRow.hint: Index of the row which contains the column names
keyRow.description: Relative to selected 'Range', first row index is 0
keyRow.ai_hint: Relative to selected 'Range', first row index is 0

dataStartRow.name: dataStartRow
dataStartRow.hint: Index of first row which contains the actual data
dataStartRow.description: Relative to selected 'Range', first row index is 0
dataStartRow.ai_hint: Relative to selected 'Range', first row index is 0

columnToMatchOn.name: columnToMatchOn
columnToMatchOn.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
columnToMatchOn.hint: Used to find the correct row to update. Doesn't get changed.
columnToMatchOn.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

valueToMatchOn.displayName: Value of Column to Match On
valueToMatchOn.name: valueToMatchOn

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'table' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'worksheet'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'table'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataMode'
IF dataMode == 'raw' AND resource == 'table' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'data'
IF dataMode == 'define' AND resource == 'table' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF rawData == True THEN SHOW parameter 'dataProperty'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'addTable' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'addTable' THEN SHOW parameter 'worksheet'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'addTable' THEN SHOW parameter 'selectRange'
IF selectRange == 'manual' AND resource == 'table' AND operation == 'addTable' THEN SHOW parameter 'range'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'addTable' THEN SHOW parameter 'hasHeaders'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'convertToRange' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'convertToRange' THEN SHOW parameter 'worksheet'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'convertToRange' THEN SHOW parameter 'table'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'deleteTable' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'deleteTable' THEN SHOW parameter 'worksheet'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'deleteTable' THEN SHOW parameter 'table'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'worksheet'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'table'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'rawData'
IF rawData == True AND resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataProperty'
IF rawData == True AND resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'worksheet'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'table'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'rawData'
IF rawData == True AND resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataProperty'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF /rawData == True THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF /rawData == False THEN SHOW parameter 'column'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'lookup' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'lookup' THEN SHOW parameter 'worksheet'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'lookup' THEN SHOW parameter 'table'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'lookup' THEN SHOW parameter 'lookupColumn'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'lookup' THEN SHOW parameter 'lookupValue'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'lookup' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'workbook' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'workbook' AND operation == 'addWorksheet' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'workbook' AND operation == 'addWorksheet' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'workbook' AND operation == 'deleteWorkbook' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'workbook' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'workbook' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'workbook' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'worksheet' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'worksheet'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataMode'
IF dataMode == 'raw' AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'data'
IF dataMode == 'define' AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'clear' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'clear' THEN SHOW parameter 'worksheet'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'clear' THEN SHOW parameter 'applyTo'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'clear' THEN SHOW parameter 'useRange'
IF useRange == True AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'clear' THEN SHOW parameter 'range'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'deleteWorksheet' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'deleteWorksheet' THEN SHOW parameter 'worksheet'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'readRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'readRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'worksheet'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'readRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'useRange'
IF useRange == True AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'readRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'range'
IF useRange == True AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'readRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'keyRow'
IF useRange == True AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'readRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataStartRow'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'readRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF rawData == True THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'worksheet'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'useRange'
IF dataMode IN ["autoMap", "define"] AND useRange == True AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'range'
IF dataMode == 'raw' AND useRange == True AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'range'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataMode'
IF dataMode == 'raw' AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'data'
IF dataMode IN ["autoMap", "define"] AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'columnToMatchOn'
IF dataMode == 'define' AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'valueToMatchOn'
IF dataMode == 'define' AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF /dataMode == 'raw' THEN HIDE parameter 'updateAll'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'workbook'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'worksheet'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'useRange'
IF dataMode IN ["autoMap", "define"] AND useRange == True AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'range'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataMode'
IF dataMode IN ["autoMap", "define"] AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'columnToMatchOn'
IF dataMode == 'define' AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'valueToMatchOn'
IF dataMode == 'define' AND resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF resource == 'worksheet' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF /dataMode IN ["autoMap", "define"] AND /useRange == True THEN SHOW parameter 'appendAfterSelectedRange'
